net.proteusframework.ui.miwt

Interface History

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingHistory, HistoryImpl

    public interface History
    Implements a History list. This is basically a stack with some convenience methods. The history is limited to a certain number of elements.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PROP_CURRENT
      The property fired when the current element is changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(HistoryElement e)

      Moves back in the history.

    • Field Detail

      • PROP_CURRENT

        static final String PROP_CURRENT
        The property fired when the current element is changed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(HistoryElement e)
        Adds an element to the history and makes it the current element.
        Parameters:
        e - The history element to add.

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Add a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        l - The listener.

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        void addPropertyChangeListener(String propertyName,
                             PropertyChangeListener l)
        Add a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The property name.
        l - The listener.

      • back

        boolean back()
        Moves back in the history.
        Returns:
        true if the current element changed.

      • backOrClear

        void backOrClear()
        Go back in the history. If the history is already at the first element, then clear it.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the history.

      • current

        HistoryElement current()
        Gets the current element.
        Returns:
        HistoryElement or null if there is none.

      • forward

        boolean forward()
        Moves forward in the history.
        Returns:
        true if the current element changed.

      • getMark

        int getMark()
        Get the mark of the current element in the History. It will be in [0,size()].
        Returns:
        The current element index.

      • removePropertyChangeListener

        void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Remove a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        l - The listener.

      • removePropertyChangeListener

        void removePropertyChangeListener(String propertyName,
                                PropertyChangeListener l)
        Remove a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The property name.
        l - The listener.

      • size

        int size()
        Gets the number of elements in the History.
        Returns:
        The number of history elements.
